attributes.action: for every woman in the UK to be offered a sensitive test for group B Streptococcus (GBS) at 35-37 weeks of pregnancy on the NHS, and for every pregnant woman to be given accurate information about GBS as a routine part of her antenatal care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the nhs will give older people to care to prevent health issues why not newborn babies, lets try to yet again change this and save babies lives
